## i2cWriteByte() function

This sends a single byte to the device.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function i2cWriteByte(handle: number, byteVal: number): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

handle


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The I2C device handle as returned by [i2cOpen()](./lgpio.i2copen.md)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

byteVal


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

0-0xFF, the value to write


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
